version_description:
Access to all sports results is back in the homepage of the app. Go to the RESULTS tab on the left of the screen.
A section dedicated to the Olympic Games has been added the menu. 
You will find all the news, schedules and results live from Rio.

You can now easily access to your favourite’ news from the Force Touch option of your iPhone.  

Minor Bug Fixed

For any suggestion or query email iOS@eurosport.com

Access to all sports results is back in the homepage of the app. Go to the RESULTS tab on the left of the screen.
A section dedicated to the Olympic Games has been added the menu. 
You will find all the news, schedules and results live from Rio.

You can now easily access to your favourite’ news from the Force Touch option of your iPhone.  

Minor Bug Fixed

For any suggestion or query email iOS@eurosport.com
错误修复
Technical changes to iOS 10

New: football teams now have their own pages

Get the latest news and results and access key information for all your favourite teams. 

Add your team from the "alerts and favourites" section or click on your club's logo from a match page.

Article pages and the video page are being updated. The design is being reworked with all items highlighted for your convenience. 

If you want to change the text size, go to your settings.

For any comments or suggestions email: iOS@eurosport.com
问题解决

视频网友：请体验我们全新的可定制化的播放列表。打开一个视频并且让自己沉浸到这些完全由自己定制的视频中去吧。

iOS10：这个版本完全由您决定。除此之外，强化了通知功能，您现在可以通过新设备来跟踪全部您喜爱球队的比赛结果。现在就体验吧！

预测：下载我们全新的消息扩展以便和您的朋友一起预测所有足球、篮球以及橄榄球的比赛结果。

自行车和F1：您现在可以查看自行车各个赛段和F1各个分站的详细比赛情况。

数据：在我们全新的球队页中查看所有的俱乐部和运动员的详细数据。
错误修复
This version is not a revolution but a minor update to give you a best user experience

From now on, you have statistics available for each team of each football championship.
Also, you can find statistics for each player in your team.
We have improved the performance of your application by fixing several bugs.
错误修复
错误修复
错误修复

Giro d'Italia, Tour de France, Vuelta ... the big cycling tours are coming. On this occasion your application has been enhanced with new features: new stage profiles, live gaps between groups and a brand new interactive map that allows to follow the riders in real time.
The application cache management has also been reviewed to optimize the space occupied on your smartphone.
And of course, we also took advantage of this update to make several corrections and improvements for an ever better experience.

错误修复

The Tour de France is coming! Take advantage of the latest version of our real-time interactive map to follow each stage in real time as close as possible to the riders.
Another novelty: a complete renovation of the Profile section to manage your alerts and your favorites even more simply.
And as usual, a multitude of improvements to offer you the best possible experience, among which the optimization of the pages articles and the correction of a bugs on the comments.

Our Winter Olympics coverage lets you watch every moment of PyeongChang 2018 live - and also as catch up. Results and schedule information are at your fingertips and notifications alert you to the events that matters most.

A brand new LIVE section in now available. Thanks to your Eurosport Player credentials, you can now access Eurosport channels.
Your Olympics section is still there for a few days with all the results and content of the Games.
And for those waiting for the portrait mode to come back on tablet, it will come back soon.

Don’t miss out. Improved in-app experience with new features such as Immersive Mode, live play by play with commentary, 
and live in-game sports stats.
Don’t miss out. Improved in-app experience with new features such as Immersive Mode, live play by play with commentary, and live in-game sports stats.

French Open is over, but the World Cup is starting !
Enjoy every live action of the game in real time for all the World Cup matches.

The new Eurosport app is an updated digital experience giving you quicker access to the sports you love. Easier and faster to use, the new app offers an even better way to keep up with your favourite sports.
In this version, we fixed the bug with the favourites and many other small defects to improve experience.
In this version, we fixed the bug with the favourites and many other small defects to improve experience.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

In this latest release, keep up to date with your favourite sport, competitions or athletes with the latest update to our Sport Hub pages.

We heard you when you said you missed being able to set a sport as your homepage, so we have added that back in.
In this latest release, we have added live Customer Support chat so help is now just a click away.

We love receiving your feedback and we heard you when you said you were experiencing difficulties reading all of the great content. This release includes some design changes to make the homepage more readable.
We have put you in control of the font when reading articles with the ability to select your preferred size. 
We have made it easier for you to navigate through all of the articles with a simple swipe of your screen.
In this latest release we have answered your request for easier navigation to latest articles as well as further improvements to how you can reach our Customer Service team.
In this release we have added additional country versions in the app that might be better suited to you, take a look in the profile section for the full list of supported countries.
In this release we have added additional country versions in the app that might be better suited to you, take a look in the profile section for the full list of supported countries.

We love getting your feedback as it helps us to continually improve your Eurosport experience. This latest version gives you general updates and bug fixes.
